name: Fun with OIDC
description: This app demonstrates various OpenID Connect flows, scopes and tokens

OKTA_AUTHORIZATION_SERVER_ID.description: The Okta authorization server id - ex: aus9vmork8ww5twZg0h7

OKTA_OIDC_CLIENT_ID.description: The Okta OIDC application client id

OKTA_OIDC_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The Okta OIDC application client secret

OKTA_SESSION_USERNAME.description: The email address of the user that the app will establish a session as

OKTA_SESSION_PASSWORD.description: The password of the user that the app will establish a session as

OKTA_ZORK_URL.description: The URL to where the Zork game is hosted. Leave blank if unsure.
